errors.error_description: Added incorrect setup.py command with invalid parameters for a pip-installed package
correction_candidates: Remove the setup.py command as it's not needed for pip installations
Use pip install photutils --user instead for user-specific installation
Replace with conda install -c conda-forge photutils for conda users
Use python -m pip install photutils for module-based installation
errors.golden_answer: Remove the setup.py command as it's not needed for pip installations
